name: ST0D_01.BIN
original:
<NEXT>Someone's gone and
stole all my boats!<NEXT>I've only got one
left, and it's
broken down--<NEXT>won't be much
use to you![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Need a boat?<NEXT>Normally, you could
take your pick,<NEXT>but we don't have
any boats right
now--sorry...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x96]d[0x0][0x97][0xe3]7[0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8Customer
"The dock's out
that way,<NEXT>but you won't find
any boats there...<NEXT>Heard someone's
stolen all the
boats!<NEXT>Now who would do
a thing like that?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>They say someone
came and stole
all the boats...<NEXT>What I want to
know is, what's the
person who stole them<NEXT>gonna do with all
those boats?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I wanted to rent
a boat too...<NEXT>What? Go to the
ruins!? No, no,
not me!<NEXT>I was gonna go
fishing!<NEXT>There's a lot of
trout out there
in the lake, see?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>They must have
made that giant
robot<NEXT>out of the boats
they stole...<NEXT>Good thing I
didn't go fishing
after all--<NEXT>they might have
attacked me![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Hmmm...I bet it's
the Main Gate...<NEXT>There's some kind
of commotion going
on over there...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I've been a
fisherman for my
whole life,<NEXT>but with the way
the water's all
churned up,<NEXT>even I wouldn't
be able to catch
anything...<NEXT>I guess I'll have
to wait a while...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>You might not
know it, but I
love fishing!<NEXT>Hey, you there!
Wanna have a good
time with me?<NEXT>See? Sometimes I
get a catch, and
sometimes I don't![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Someone once told
me a long time ago<NEXT>that there are cities
underground...<NEXT>And that the
people who lived
there<NEXT>weren't our
ancestors--they
were different...<NEXT>I know it sounds
pretty silly...<NEXT>I never gave it
much thought until
today...<NEXT>But talking to you
makes me think<NEXT>anything is
possible, MegaMan...<NEXT>You sure are an
interesting lad...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Did you know
there was a
tidal wave?<NEXT>If this keeps up,
I won't be able
to catch anything!<NEXT>How'm I supposed
to pay my bills
then?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Well, since they
call it the Main
Gate,<NEXT>I imagine it
must be some
kind of door...<NEXT>But the more
important question
is,<NEXT>where does it
lead to?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I guess the ocean
must be angry
about something...<NEXT>But is it at
something we've
done...<NEXT>or is it something
else?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Getting the
refractor out of<NEXT>the ruins on the
lake won't be so
easy...<NEXT>Lots of Diggers
have tried
before...<NEXT>But you just might
be the one to do
it...Good luck![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Don't worry
about me--<NEXT>I can go fishing
later![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8It's a model of
a boat...<NEXT>You won't be able
to use this![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8It's a float.<NEXT>But it won't be
much help for you
with all your gear![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8What's in the
drawer?<NEXT>There's some
fishing gear
inside...<NEXT>You should leave
it there--<NEXT>Wily would
probably get angry
if you took it...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]
